title: Get The Kinda Funny App NOW on iOS and Android!
description:
Get the Kinda Funny iOS App now! https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/kinda-funny/id989981469?mt=8

Get the Kinda Funny Android App now! 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.app.kindafunny

Watch the FULL Kinda Funny Live Here! https://youtu.be/2uJBDk0mFF4




Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys

transcript_chunks.text: from the very beginning Kinda Funny was designed to be very positive, very engaging but also remarkably fun to be a part of and that's exactly what we did with the Kinda Funny app. Yeah, that's right, we got an app. One of the things that makes the Kinda Funny app so incredible is its stunningly simple design. We stripped away all the clutter by giving you all of the Kinda Funny and Kinda Funny Games content in one place, with those as only diverse options. Why use any other app? We made sure the Kinda Funny app was conceived, designed, and developed as a singular experience. When I say we, I mean a 21-year-old Super Genius named James. Thanks, James. Accessible, relevant, unparalleled, inspired, fundamentally important. Do you remember those super cool Kinda Funny forums? We announced you can log in and use them straight from this app. You're welcome. You can watch our videos, you can see all of the events we're going to be at, you can see all of our Tweets in one place, you can access your

Get the Kinda Funny App NOW on iOS and download it straight from this app, you're welcome. You can watch our videos, see all of the events we're going to be at, see all of our Tweets in one place, access your Patreon, check out our store - really, it's just like any other awesome app but it's better because it's ours. You don't need to ask; we already have your answer: when will the Kinda Funny forums go live? When will the Kinda Funny App be released? Ladies and gentlemen, the answer is right now. Seriously, you're going - just go download the app right now; it's no big deal. Just go on, go on the App Store, see it, you can search for Kinda Funny, uh-huh, it's loading... there it is! Click on it, boom, you're downloading. It's on iOS only right now, but I can tell you right now, Android guys, it's coming soon; Android girls may also soon have the Kinda Funny app. Let's be honest, how freaking cool is it that we have an app?
